fields.name: vehicle_id
fields.title: ID referencing vehicles.vehicle_id
fields.description: Identifies a vehicle, such as a train consist. If possible, this should match other internal agency vehicle IDs.

fields.name: train_car_id
fields.title: ID referencing train_cars.train_car_id
fields.description: Identifies a train car or an asset that is a component of the vehicle.

fields.name: order
fields.description: The assigned order of the train car or asset within the vehicle.

fields.name: operator_id
fields.description: Identifies an operator (person). If possible, this should match other internal agency operator IDs.
